      • missle_out_of_field

        public boolean missle_out_of_field​(double imgvY)
        We check is the missle out of window by below 0 horizontal value IMPORTANT we check the launched missles only. The booster type missles we check in the boosters checker method 'cos we store those missles in the boosters list
        Parameters:
        imgvY - the parameter name
        Returns:
        if the missle 'above' our screen (horizontal value below 0) the mwthos return true

      • collision_detected

        public boolean collision_detected​(double object_1x,
                                  double object_1y,
                                  double object_2x,
                                  double object_2y,
                                  double object_2width,
                                  double object_2height)
        Parameters:
        object_1x - the LayoutX() value of the object_1
        object_1y - the LayoutY() value of the object_1
        object_2x - the LayoutX() value of the object_2
        object_2y - the LayoutY() value of the object_2
        object_2width - the width uf object_2
        object_2height - the height of object_2
        Returns:
        A boolean TRUE or FALSE depends on are the two object collisioned

      • do_booster_timers

        public void do_booster_timers()
        Its one of the most important method. Here we call the events generator and handle the missle cooldown after launch booster time

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a random Int number

      • get_random_x_koordinate

        public int get_random_x_koordinate​(int b)
        generate a random vertical coordinate depends on our movement. I mean simple right or simple left or up and right or down and left etc...
        Parameters:
        b - minimum value is 0
        Returns:
        a random Int number

      • get_play_press_exit

        public void get_play_press_exit()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        After we pressed ESC during game and choosed the EXIT button, this method will be called. Lead us back to Main Menu We also call this method in the endgame phase where we can save our score
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
